examples.example: 我和朋友们去餐厅享受了美味的牛排，真是一次愉快的体验。

translate.english: I went to the restaurant with my friends to enjoy the delicious steak. It was really a pleasant experience.

examples.example: 我为父母精心准备了一份牛排晚餐，看到他们开心的样子我也很幸福。

translate.english: I carefully prepared a steak dinner for my parents, and seeing their happy faces, I also felt very happy.

examples.example: 今天妈妈做了美味的牛排，一家人吃得开心极了。

translate.english: Today mother made delicious steak and the whole family ate happily.
